Are AI chatbots worth it?

30%

Chatbots can save up to 30% in customer support service costs.

55%

Of consumers are interested in interacting with a business using messaging apps to solve a problem.

40%

Consumers do not care whether a chatbot or a real human helps them, as long as they are getting the help they need. 

2.5x

Sites that incorporate chatbots have experienced a significant increase in customer engagement, with users spending 2.5 times longer on average compared to websites without chatbots.

Why cold emails are effective for lead generation

82%

A study revealed that 82% of buyers accept meetings with salespeople who reach out to them via personalized cold emails.

5%

In terms of conversion rates, cold emails have an average conversion rate of 5%, making them a valuable tool for generating leads

40x

Email is almost 40 times more effective at securing customers compared to social media

75%

Personalized cold emails have a 75% higher click-through rate compared to non-personalized ones
